bio:
“Excellent writing and research skills with total dedication to adhere to my deadline. A true gem and highly recommended.” - client review.

"I can be pretty demanding. She lived up to my expectations and more. I will definitely be using her writing services again and again.” - client review.

The above are a couple of real client reviews out of many, many more ...!!

I am a multilingual professional with exceptional writing and editing skills. I am a postgraduate in English and an MBA, and I have twenty plus years of freelance writing experience that I can commit to your project. 

Having worked in the freelance industry for so long, I have written for practically every niche on the web. I write articles, blog posts, web pages, reports, press releases, product descriptions, eBooks, sales letters and newsletters. I am detail-oriented, I research my topics well, and everything I write will pass Copyscape. What you will receive from me is 100% original content that is interesting to read. I take extra care that my work has perfect grammar, spelling and syntax, and reads well. I am also well versed in popular keyword incorporating techniques. 

I believe that writing should be crisp, exact, and concise. I pride myself on working quickly and accurately, and always meeting deadlines. In addition, when you hire me for a job, you can be assured that I am the one doing the writing. I personally complete each project that I accept.

I can follow instructions intelligently and you'll never need to micro-manage me.

Bottomline, I like to keep my clients happy and coming back for more!
I work Monday through Friday, full time, and will work weekends if I have a pressing deadline to meet. Email is my preferred mode of communication, and I answer my email messages pretty quick.

services.title: Screenplays
description: $25/hr   ·   Starting at $1K

I have written over twenty screenplays for clients in addition to several of my own. When you hire me, you don't only hire a writer who will provide you with a script ready to be sent to a producer or…

bio:
My most recent novel is "The Deeper Dark," a psychological thriller published in December 2020. I have also published a drama and a dramedy as well as a children's book. 

In 2000, I was awarded my first book deal by John Gordon Burke Publisher. It was about new urbanism, an interesting way to design cities. That was my first actual taste of writing professionally and I have been enjoying it ever since. 

I have written over twenty books in my career that have led to some rather interesting experiences. I wrote one book for a former NFL player who is now a public speaker. Another interesting book was about discrimination in the workplace at one of the major corporations in America. 

I have also written over ten screenplays that include comedies, dramas, and thrillers. Last year, I wrote a drama about an undercover agent who gets so deep in the gangs of Miami that he has to be yanked out before he ends up in a gang war. It was a true story that led to one of the biggest drug busts in American History. 

After that, a producer asked if I would write a screenplay for her about conversion camps. She gave me the notes and I wrote the screenplay that is now in the hands of executives. 

The screenplay I recently optioned is a thriller that a production company is excited about doing. I retained the rights for the book and that's what I suggest most people think about when they have a good idea. Write the book and the screenplay. Not only can I help you get your book published, but I can get you in touch with the producers who will want to see your screenplay.

Testimonials:
Producer for my thriller: "It was a long process, but we’re glad to have found you out of the crowd of 150! Let’s make a film!"

Producer for the conversion camps film: "The script is extremely great, very well written."

When you contact me about your book or screenplay, you will get a very attentive writer who makes it a point to go over the details of your project meticulously. That's how I'm able to provide clients with what they envision and not my idea of what I think they'd like. 

When I give you a deadline, I will meet it. Most deadlines are set with buffer time to get through the challenges of writing an interesting story. In my years of experience, I know how long a project will take and I don't give unreasonable expectations.

I have taken on rush jobs before. I always meet the deadline. But, we'd have to negotiate that and I'm open to it.

bio:
The name "PAVO" is inspired from the devotional song "Mor Mukut" which praises Lord Krishna. The song's literal translation means "Peacock Crown". "Pavo Cristatus" actually means peacock. Thus came Pavo Group of Companies.

Pavo Technologies Private Limited is a Website Design & Mobile Application Development Company. It started on 23rd July, 2014. Founded by Mr Kumar Sharma, with him and Mrs Arunima Sharma as directors.

The Design, Development and Marketing Company:

Pavo Technologies Private Limited is a Design, Development and Marketing Company that offers a wide range of services. From Website Design and Development to Mobile App Development, Digital Marketing, SEM, SEO, SMM, SMO and PPC.

Website Design and Development:

With more than 15 years of experience in the field of web development, we offer a wide range of services to our clients. Our team is comprised of highly skilled designers who know how to make each project as efficient and effective as possible.

Marketing Services:

With an extensive background in Marketing and Digital Marketing, we know how to promote your business effectively. We combine our skills in web design and marketing services to help your company grow at all times.

Mobile Application Development:

We are mobile application developers with over 15 years of experience delivering well-designed apps for iOS and Android devices. We work with startups as well as established businesses looking for a new revenue stream or innovative way to get their message out to the world.

Grow Your Online Presence with Pavo Technologies Private Limited:

Pavo Technologies Private Limited is an Digital Marketing Agency that specializes in helping businesses grow their online presence. We provide a suite of services to help you reach more customers and increase your ROI.
Just fund on Guru Safe Pay and 100% fund release only after the final delivery will be done with your satisfaction.

abstrac: The creative initiative is focused in the creation and development of a new level of messages and art in the comic books.
bio:
I'm an illustrator with specialization in comic and storytelling, pencils, inks, colors, lettering and script writing. My name is Nicolás Colacitti, from Mar del Plata (Buenos Aires, Argentina), and I'm 34 years old. 

I'm working as a freelance comic book artist for 15 years, having worked with clients from all around the globe. I've got experience in accomplishing long term jobs and deadlines. I'm versatile in terms of artistic styles, and I've also worked as illustrator, pixel artist, technical illustrator, concept artist, animator and musician.

My creative initiative is focused in the creation and development of a new level of messages and art in the comic books. I'm currently directing New Concept Comics, my art studio, which is composed of illustrators and colorists, concept artists, video editors/animators, designers, writers and photographers, so these services can be hired if needed. I can also delegate the full work or aspects of the work to my team members and supervise the creative process in order to increase the production quality and speed.

I'm a workaholic professional accountant and have an accounting degree and practical knowledge. I'm providing financial and legal services since last 7 years to my local and overseas clients. I'm excellent to setting up a new businesses in QBO, Xero, Wave or any other accounting software.
I bring with me a keen ability to manage Accounts and produce accurate reports e.g. Profit & Loss, Balance sheet, Cash Flow etc, very familiar to work with Quickbooks, Wave, XERO, Zoho, TALLY & MS-Office.
